tweetsnear.me June 2011

View Source Code

tweetsnear.me was a personal project that I worked on in several classes to learn more about mapping, geolocation, third-party APIs and Node.js. The concept was to provide an easy interface for finding out what people on twitter were saying nearby based on the user’s location. The application used the HTML5 geolocation API to get the user’s location straight from the browser, and also supported searching for tweets by location.
